# Copilot Agents

Specialized AI agents that focus on specific domains within DevOps and development workflows.

| Agent               | Specialization                                                                                                                                    |
| ------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| **Angular**         | Angular framework development using angular-cli MCP with Playwright verification for UI testing on http://localhost:4200                          |
| **AzDevOps**        | Azure DevOps pipeline authoring, import, execution, and troubleshooting with Microsoft Learn best practices and workload identity management      |
| **AzureDeployment** | Azure infrastructure provisioning, Azure CLI automation, resource deployment, and operational log analysis using official Microsoft documentation |
| **GH Actions**      | GitHub Actions workflow creation, optimization, and troubleshooting using Microsoft Learn MCP guidance and Copilot context                        |
| **SmokeTester**     | Automated smoke testing and validation for deployed applications with REST API testing and browser automation for functionality verification      |
